# ketchup-fld



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                           | Type               | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `data`   | `data`    | Effective data to pass to the component                                                               | `any`              | `undefined` |
| `json`   | `json`    | Data the FLD must parse to fully be configured. It must be either an Object or a JSON parsable string | `object \| string` | `''`        |


## Events

| Event              | Description                        | Type                |
| ------------------ | ---------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `ketchupFldSubmit` | When the FLD values are confirmed. | `CustomEvent<void>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                            | Description                                                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--fld_comp-margin, --kup-fld_component-margin` | Specifies internal margin between label, submit button and dynamic component |
